  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92298</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92298</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Apparent loss in mass of a burning candle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Offensichtlicher Verlust in der Masse einer 
brennenden Kerze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perte apparente dans la masse d'une bougie 
brûlante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perda aparente na massa de uma vela ardente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perdita apparente nella massa di candela burning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προφανής απώλεια στη μάζα ενός καίγοντας κεριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pérdida evidente en masa de una vela ardiente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the gaseous by-products when a candle is burned.  The apparent loss in mass is actually converted into water vapour and carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die gasförmigen 
Nebenerscheinungen, wenn eine Kerze gebrannt wird. Der 
offensichtliche Verlust in der Masse wird wirklich in Wasserdampf und 
Kohlendioxyd umgewandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les sous-produits gazeux quand
une bougie est brûlée. La perte apparente dans la masse est 
convertie réellement en vapeur d'eau et anhydride carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os by-products gasosos quando
uma vela é queimada. A perda aparente na massa é convertida 
realmente no vapor de água e no dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i sottoprodotti gassosi 
quando una candela è bruciata. La perdita apparente nella massa
realmente è convertita in vapore acqueo ed in anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει αεριώδη υποπροϊόντα 
πότε ένα κερί καίγεται. Η προφανής απώλεια στη μάζα 
μετατρέπεται πραγματικά στον υδρατμό και το διοξείδιο του 
άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los subproductos gaseosos 
cuando se quema una vela. La pérdida evidente en masa se 
convierte realmente en el bióxido del vapor de agua y de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Massenänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserdampf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">brûlure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement de masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vapeur d'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">queimadura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança maciça</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vapor de água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bruciarsi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento totale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vapore acqueo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el quemarse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
